mapper.select: select cu.customerId, customerAccount,customerName,idNumber,phone, (SELECT sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND ,loginInTime,loginOutTime)) FROM oslogin WHERE osid in (SELECT osId FROM os WHERE customerId = cu.customerId)) as timeLong FROM customer as cu LIMIT #{index},#{size}

select cu.customerId, customerAccount,customerName,idNumber,phone, (SELECT sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND ,loginInTime,loginOutTime)) FROM oslogin WHERE osid in (SELECT osId FROM os WHERE customerId = cu.customerId)) as timeLong FROM customer as cu ORDER BY timeLong DESC LIMIT #{index},#{size}
select count(*) as count FROM customer

select cu.customerId,cu.customerAccount,cu.customerName,cu.idNumber,cu.phone,DATE_FORMAT(ol.loginOutTime,'%Y%m') months , (SELECT sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND ,loginInTime,loginOutTime)) FROM oslogin WHERE osid in (SELECT osId FROM os WHERE customerId = cu.customerId) AND DATE_FORMAT(loginOutTime,'%Y%m') = months ) as totalTime FROM osLogin as ol INNER JOIN os on os.osId = ol.osId Inner JOIN customer as cu on cu.customerId = os.customerId GROUP BY cu.customerId, months LIMIT #{index},#{size}
